Field Label: This instrument was downloaded from the CAMH Common Data Elements Library. All fields have been institutionally standardized and should not be modified. Please direct any questions or concerns to clinical.redcap@camh.ca This field is @HIDDEN

Section Header: <font color="black"><b>Over the <u>last 2 weeks</u> how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? <i>(Click the circle to indicate your answer)</u>
Field Label: 1. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day
0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: 3. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: 4. Feeling tired or having little energy
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day
0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: 6. Feeling bad about yourself -- or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: 7. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: 8. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite -- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: 9. Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 0, 0- Not at all | 1, 1- Several days | 2, 2- More than half the days | 3, 3- Nearly every day

Field Label: If you checked off <u>any</u> problems, how <u>difficult </u> have these problems made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not difficult at all | 2, Somewhat difficult | 3, Very difficult | 4, Extremely difficult
